articles.title: Meet the man who says he made Trump overturn family separation policy
articles.description: People shared Antar Davidson's story as an example of the harm caused by Trump's zero tolerance policy that led to separating children from parents.

articles.title: Ex-Shelter Worker Says New Staffers Received Just 1 Week of Training to Work With Traumatized Migrant Children
articles.description: A former staffer who called out conditions at an Arizona migrant shelter had more to say this weekend about the poor management of centers currently housing undocumented children. Read more...

articles.title: Here's What School Is Really Like For Some Migrant Children Separated From Their Parents

articles.author: Molly Hennessy-Fiske
articles.title: 'Prison-like' migrant youth shelter is understaffed, unequipped for Trump's 'zero tolerance' policy, insider says
articles.description: Colleagues at a government-contracted shelter in Arizona had a specific request for Antar Davidson when three Brazilian migrant children arrived: “Tell them they can’t hug.” Davidson, 32, is of Brazilian descent and speaks Portuguese. He said the siblings — a…

articles.author: De Elizabeth
articles.title: A Migrant Youth Shelter Worker Quit After Reportedly Being Ordered Not to Let Siblings Hug
articles.description: After reportedly being ordered not to let siblings hug, a migrant youth shelter worker in Arizona has quit.

articles.description: We had plenty of warning it was coming, but it's still horrifying to know it's here: The New Cruelty is preparing to assemble its first "tent city" for children taken away from their parents under Donald Trump's family-separation policy. The camp will be buil…

articles.author: Blake Ellis, Melanie Hicken, and Bob Ortega, CNN Investigates
articles.title: Handcuffs, assaults, and drugs called 'vitamins': Children allege grave abuse at migrant detention facilities
articles.description: In court documents, children allege grave abuse at migrant detention facilities, ranging from handcuffs to assaults to drugs disguised as vitamins.
